participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate, always seeking inspiration in music and language.
participant_1.background: i am a musician. i also study languages. one of the languages that i am currently studying is spanish. my favorite spanish word is trabajo.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and practical, dedicated to family and enjoys a good scare in movies.
participant_2.background: i've a son who is in junior high school. horror movies are my favorites. my father used to work for home depot. i'm a stay at home dad.
